message: Hi Bob, I propose a fair 50-50 split. This seems reasonable as we both get the same amount.
Hi Alice, I think 60-40 is more suitable for me since the money loses value for me with each round.

Bob, I understand your concern about inflation affecting you. Let's compromise - I'll take 45 and you get 55. This is fair considering the inflation only affects your side, and waiting longer will reduce the value for you even more.
